attributes.action: make dial up internet access illegal, and supply broadband for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dial up internet access is so painfully slow that it should be banned. With the vast wealth of high bandwidth only content available on the internet at the moment, anyone using dialup is at a distinct disadvantage; all ISPs should upgrade all current dialup customers to broadband access for no installation fee.
